description: America's first line of supernatural defense against growing global threats is in disarray following the discovery of a mole within their ranks. Now, the vampire spies of C.V.O. attempt to restore order to their organization before any more agents are killed.

volume.name: CVO: Covert Vampiric Operations - Rogue State

description: The CIA has a secret weapon at its disposal, the vampire agents of CVO. But when the government no longer trusts its own, how do they rein in their toughest spies? With an even more secret weapon, of course: the DIA's vampire hunters! When these two meet, it'll be a take-no-prisoners confrontation with deadly consequences. There's plenty more horrific action and adventure in store for fans of America's most popular vampire secret agents.

volume.name: CVO: Covert Vampiric Operations - Rogue State

description: The government's vampire-hunters attack the vampire agents of CVO, attempting to end their existence with extreme prejudice. Even if they survive this brutal battle, the now-rogue agents are cut off from all their resources... and they're getting hungry. Can they continue pursuing their killer and stop the dire situation in South America without becoming the monsters the CIA now believes them to be? That's just one of the pressing issues in this latest tale of America's most popular vampire secret agents.

volume.name: CVO: Covert Vampiric Operations - Rogue State

description: In this exciting miniseries conclusion, CVO agents Britt, Bools, and Cross must face both a vampire-killing government agent and the mystical threat of a fused-body shaman that threatens to plunge the world into war!

volume.name: CVO: Covert Vampiric Operations - Rogue State

name: Prog 1723
I Loved the Danger in His Eyes

description: The action-packed final issue of this prequel to Kevin Smith's Green Hornet Series!!! As Britt Reid tries to hold his family life together, he and Kato also battle to finally end the reign of the crime families over Century City. Kato goes undercover in the Juuma Yakuza clan as Green Hornet prepares to take down the Fannelli family. Crime lords Don Fannelli and Oni Juuma will do whatever it takes to preserve their empires, and their legacies.
name: untitled
